experience.title: Chief Executive Officer
experience.description: WH Fund is a closed-ended macro driven fund which invests across a range of asset classes. The focus is to explore potential arbitrages across multiple markets, take leverage and make concentrated bets to generate an alpha for its investors.

experience.title: Partner
experience.description: Next EdVentures is an investment firm, specialising in Education sector. We don't consider Education as a "business", but as a "service". Therefore, we partner with like minded organisations and individuals; you will see all our products reasonably priced with excellent feedback from customers. Helped build these ventures from scratch: 1. www.wisdomhatch.comThis is a career development & financial education related platform, which is now being used by over 5000 active students. 2. www.MyMBAJourney.com, Partner (2015-Present)- We support students applying to top MBA programs abroad. We have grown to become one of the most trusted names in MBA Admissions Consulting space with admits to Harvard, Stanford, Yale, INSEAD, LBS, MIT and the likes. - Unlike most Admissions Consultants, you can ACTUALLY SEE our clients speak about our work on videos (these are real and verifiable testimonials):  www.GlobalCollegeinfo.com, Investor (2018-Present)- A free network for High School students to access quality information about study abroad options. 4. www.casesovercoffee.com (June 2020-Present)- A peer-to-peer case prep platform, supporting students to hone their corporate and case solving skills. (++++ investments in over 20 other ventures)
